setup_commands: micromamba install -n kinto_dev -c conda-forge numpy pandas psycopg2-binary -y
micromamba run -n kinto_dev pip install -r requirements.txt --upgrade

steps.description: Set up the development environment with required packages
If data is provided, download or prepare it in the kinto_dev environment
commands: if exists data.csv; then cp data.csv kinto_dev/data.csv; fi

steps.description: Execute the main experiment using the Kinto server
